articles.title: Exclusive: U.S. diabetes deaths top 100000 for second straight year - Reuters
articles.description: More than 100,000 Americans died from diabetes in 2021, marking the second consecutive year for that grim milestone and spurring a call for a federal mobilization similar to the fight against HIV/AIDS.
